Class AbstractConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.controller.AbstractConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Configuration
    public abstract class AbstractConfiguration
extends Object
    Abstract configuration with base getters.
